uk.ac.sanger.npg.picard
Class BamAdapterFinder

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.picard.cmdline.CommandLineProgram
      uk.ac.sanger.npg.picard.PicardCommandLine
          uk.ac.sanger.npg.picard.BamAdapterFinder

public class BamAdapterFinder
extends PicardCommandLine

Class to read matching forward/reverse BAM records and identify short inserts by looking for overlap between forward read and reverse-complemented reverse read. Note the starting position of the overlap with a new tag in the output BAM file.
